scripts.start-fresh: npm run clear && npm run build:prereqs && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run build:root && npm run check-links
scripts.build:prereqs: npm run build:plugins && npm run build:datasphere-api && npm run build:fabric-api && npm run clean-and-gen-api-docs
scripts.clean-and-gen-api-docs: npm run clean-api-docs && npm run gen-api-docs
scripts.docsearch-scraper: docker run -it --env-file=.env -e "CONFIG=$(cat algolia.json | jq -r tostring)" --platform linux/amd64 algolia/docsearch-scraper
scripts.//1: # We'd like to exclude external links. So we'd like to use `^https?://` as regex, but it doesn't work (see https://github.com/JustinBeckwith/linkinator/issues/382)
scripts.build:docusaurus-plugin-showcase: cd plugins/docusaurus-plugin-showcase && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:remark-plugin-yaml-and-json: cd plugins/remark-plugin-yaml-and-json && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:remark-plugin-a11y-checker: cd plugins/remark-plugin-a11y-checker && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:remark-plugin-vfile-reporter: cd plugins/remark-plugin-vfile-reporter && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:remark-plugin-image-to-figure: cd plugins/remark-plugin-image-to-figure && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:remark-plugin-api-table: cd plugins/remark-plugin-api-table && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:plugins: npm run build:remark-plugin-yaml-and-json && npm run build:docusaurus-plugin-showcase && npm run build:remark-plugin-a11y-checker && npm run build:remark-plugin-vfile-reporter && npm run build:remark-plugin-image-to-figure && npm run build:remark-plugin-api-table
